description.zh-cn: 指在1948年9月至1949年1月间，中国人民解放军与中华民国国军在第二次国共内战中的三次关键战役，包括辽沈战役、淮海战役、平津战役。
description.en: Refers to the three major campaigns launched by the People's Liberation Army against the Kuomintang government's army during the late stage of the Chinese Civil War, including the Liaoshen, Huaihai, and Pingjin campaigns.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的武装力量，在第二次国共内战中是与中华民国国军作战的一方。
description.en: The armed forces of the Communist Party of China, one of the belligerents in the Second Chinese Civil War against the National Revolutionary Army.

en: Republic of China National Revolutionary Army

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政府的武装力量，在第二次国共内战中是与中国人民解放军作战的一方。
description.en: The armed forces of the Government of the Republic of China, one of the belligerents in the Second Chinese Civil War against the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党与中国共产党之间在中国境内爆发的第二次内战，三大战役是此次内战中的关键阶段。
description.en: The second phase of the Chinese Civil War between the Kuomintang and the Communist Party of China. The Three Great Campaigns were a decisive stage in this war.

description.zh-cn: 三大战役之一，发生于中国东北地区，以中国人民解放军的胜利告终。
description.en: One of the Three Great Campaigns, which took place in Northeast China and ended in a decisive victory for the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 三大战役之一，发生于淮河、海州一线，以中国人民解放军的胜利告终。
description.en: One of the Three Great Campaigns, which took place around the Huai River and Haizhou, ending in a decisive victory for the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 三大战役之一，发生于华北地区，最终以北平和平解放告终。
description.en: One of the Three Great Campaigns, which took place in North China and resulted in the peaceful liberation of Beiping.

en: Government of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 由中国国民党领导的中国政府，在三大战役后在中国大陆的统治逐渐崩溃。
description.en: The government of China led by the Kuomintang, whose rule over mainland China collapsed after the Three Great Campaigns.

description.zh-cn: 领导中华民国政府及中华民国国军的政党。
description.en: The political party that led the Government of the Republic of China and the National Revolutionary Army.

description.zh-cn: 领导中国人民解放军的政党，在第二次国共内战后控制中国大陆。
description.en: The political party that led the People's Liberation Army and took control of mainland China after the Second Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 在三大战役结束后，中国人民解放军为占领中华民国首都南京而发动的战役。
description.en: A campaign launched by the People's Liberation Army to capture Nanjing, the capital of the Republic of China, after the conclusion of the Three Great Campaigns.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战期间，中国抵抗日本侵略的战争。中国共产党在此期间磨练了游击战术。
description.en: The war of resistance fought by China against Japanese invasion during World War II. The Communist Party of China honed its guerrilla tactics during this period.

description.zh-cn: 一种非对称战争的战术，被中国人民解放军在第二次国共内战中有效运用。
description.en: A form of irregular warfare tactic that was effectively utilized by the People's Liberation Army during the Second Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，在辽沈战役和平津战役中担任指挥官。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army who served as a commander in the Liaoshen and Pingjin Campaigns.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，在辽沈战役和平津战役中担任指挥官。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army who served as a commander in the Liaoshen and Pingjin Campaigns.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的一支野战部队，是辽沈战役和平津战役的主力。
description.en: A field army of the People's Liberation Army, which was the main force in the Liaoshen and Pingjin Campaigns.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国军在东北地区的指挥机构，在辽沈战役中被击败。
description.en: The command headquarters of the National Revolutionary Army in Northeast China, which was defeated in the Liaoshen Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国军将领，时任东北剿匪总司令部总司令。
description.en: A general of the National Revolutionary Army, serving as the commander-in-chief of the Northeast Bandit Suppression Headquarters.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，在淮海战役中担任指挥官。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army who served as a commander in the Huaihai Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，在淮海战役中担任指挥官。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army who served as a commander in the Huaihai Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，在淮海战役中担任指挥官，并被毛泽东评为立第一功。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army who served as a commander in the Huaihai Campaign and was credited with the top merit by Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导人，在淮海战役中担任指挥官。
description.en: A leader of the Communist Party of China who served as a commander in the Huaihai Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的一支野战部队，是淮海战役的主力之一。
description.en: A field army of the People's Liberation Army, which was one of the main forces in the Huaihai Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的一支野战部队，是淮海战役的主力之一。
description.en: A field army of the People's Liberation Army, which was one of the main forces in the Huaihai Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国军在徐州地区的指挥机构，在淮海战役中被击败。
description.en: The command headquarters of the National Revolutionary Army in the Xuzhou area, which was defeated in the Huaihai Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国军将领，时任徐州剿匪总司令部总司令。
description.en: A general of the National Revolutionary Army, serving as the commander-in-chief of the Xuzhou Bandit Suppression Headquarters.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国军在华中地区的指挥机构，其增援部队在淮海战役中被击败。
description.en: The command headquarters of the National Revolutionary Army in Central China, whose reinforcement troops were defeated in the Huaihai Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国军将领，时任华中剿匪总司令部总司令。
description.en: A general of the National Revolutionary Army, serving as the commander-in-chief of the Central China Bandit Suppression Headquarters.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国军将领，其部队在淮海战役中被消灭。
description.en: A general of the National Revolutionary Army whose troops were eliminated in the Huaihai Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国军将领，其部队在淮海战役中被消灭。
description.en: A general of the National Revolutionary Army whose troops were eliminated in the Huaihai Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国军将领，其部队在淮海战役中被消灭。
description.en: A general of the National Revolutionary Army whose troops were eliminated in the Huaihai Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国军将领，其部队在淮海战役中被消灭。
description.en: A general of the National Revolutionary Army whose troops were eliminated in the Huaihai Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国军将领，其部队在淮海战役中被消灭。
description.en: A general of the National Revolutionary Army whose troops were eliminated in the Huaihai Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会主席，评价粟裕在淮海战役中立下第一功。
description.en: Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, who praised Su Yu for his top contribution in the Huaihai Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，在平津战役中担任指挥官。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army who served as a commander in the Pingjin Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的一支野战部队，是平津战役的主力之一。
description.en: A field army of the People's Liberation Army, which was one of the main forces in the Pingjin Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国军在华北地区的指挥机构，在平津战役中被击败及改编。
description.en: The command headquarters of the National Revolutionary Army in North China, which was defeated and reorganized in the Pingjin Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国军将领，时任华北剿匪总司令部总司令，在平津战役中率部投降。
description.en: A general of the National Revolutionary Army, serving as the commander-in-chief of the North China Bandit Suppression Headquarters, who surrendered with his troops in the Pingjin Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国军将领，其部队在平津战役中被消灭。
description.en: A general of the National Revolutionary Army whose troops were eliminated in the Pingjin Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 三大战役是第二次国共内战中的三次关键战役。
description.en: The Three Great Campaigns were three key battles within the Second Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 在三大战役中，国军损失超过150万，精锐部队丧失殆尽。
description.en: During the Three Great Campaigns, the National Army lost over 1.5 million troops, and its elite forces were almost completely wiped out.

description.zh-cn: 三大战役结束后，中国国民党所领导的中华民国政府在中国大陆的统治逐渐崩溃。
description.en: After the Three Great Campaigns, the rule of the Kuomintang-led Government of the Republic of China on mainland China gradually collapsed.

description.zh-cn: 解放军通过三大战役的胜利，取得了对国军的决定性优势。
description.en: Through the victories in the Three Great Campaigns, the People's Liberation Army gained a decisive advantage over the National Army.

description.zh-cn: 三大战役的胜利为解放军发动渡江战役，向全中国进军创造了条件。
description.en: The victory in the Three Great Campaigns created the conditions for the People's Liberation Army to launch the Yangtze River Crossing Campaign and advance across China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在中国抗日战争中磨练了灵活的游击战术。
description.en: The Communist Party of China honed its flexible guerrilla warfare tactics during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 解放军在三大战役中充分展现了其游击战术的优势。
description.en: The People's Liberation Army fully demonstrated the advantages of its guerrilla tactics during the Three Great Campaigns.

description.zh-cn: 林彪是辽沈战役的指挥官之一。
description.en: Lin Biao was one of the commanders of the Liaoshen Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 罗荣桓是辽沈战役的指挥官之一。
description.en: Luo Ronghuan was one of the commanders of the Liaoshen Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 在辽沈战役中，国军东北剿匪总司令部所属的主力部队被歼灭或俘虏，共计47万2千余人。
description.en: In the Liaoshen Campaign, the main forces of the National Army's Northeast Bandit Suppression Headquarters were eliminated or captured, totaling over 472,000 personnel.

description.zh-cn: 卫立煌在辽沈战役期间担任国军东北剿匪总司令部总司令。
description.en: Wei Lihuang served as the commander-in-chief of the National Army's Northeast Bandit Suppression Headquarters during the Liaoshen Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 刘伯承是淮海战役的指挥官之一。
description.en: Liu Bocheng was one of the commanders of the Huaihai Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 陈毅是淮海战役的指挥官之一。
description.en: Chen Yi was one of the commanders of the Huaihai Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 粟裕是淮海战役的指挥官之一。
description.en: Su Yu was one of the commanders of the Huaihai Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平是淮海战役的指挥官之一。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping was one of the commanders of the Huaihai Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 在淮海战役中，国军徐州剿匪总司令部所属的主力部队被消灭及改编。
description.en: In the Huaihai Campaign, the main forces of the National Army's Xuzhou Bandit Suppression Headquarters were eliminated and reorganized.

description.zh-cn: 在淮海战役中，国军华中剿匪总司令部所属的增援部队被消灭。
description.en: In the Huaihai Campaign, the reinforcement troops from the National Army's Central China Bandit Suppression Headquarters were eliminated.

description.zh-cn: 刘峙在淮海战役期间担任国军徐州剿匪总司令部总司令。
description.en: Liu Zhi served as the commander-in-chief of the National Army's Xuzhou Bandit Suppression Headquarters during the Huaihai Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 白崇禧在淮海战役期间担任国军华中剿匪总司令部总司令。
description.en: Bai Chongxi served as the commander-in-chief of the National Army's Central China Bandit Suppression Headquarters during the Huaihai Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东评价粟裕在淮海战役中“立了第一功”。
description.en: Mao Zedong commented that Su Yu 'achieved the premier merit' in the Huaihai Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 林彪是平津战役的指挥官之一。
description.en: Lin Biao was one of the commanders of the Pingjin Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 罗荣桓是平津战役的指挥官之一。
description.en: Luo Ronghuan was one of the commanders of the Pingjin Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 聂荣臻是平津战役的指挥官之一。
description.en: Nie Rongzhen was one of the commanders of the Pingjin Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 在平津战役中，国军华北剿匪总司令部所属的主力部队52万余人被歼灭及改编。
description.en: In the Pingjin Campaign, over 520,000 troops from the main forces of the National Army's North China Bandit Suppression Headquarters were eliminated and reorganized.

description.zh-cn: 傅作义在平津战役期间担任国军华北剿匪总司令部总司令。
description.en: Fu Zuoyi served as the commander-in-chief of the National Army's North China Bandit Suppression Headquarters during the Pingjin Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 在平津战役的压力下，傅作义最终达成协议并开城投降。
description.en: Under the pressure of the Pingjin Campaign, Fu Zuoyi eventually reached an agreement and surrendered the city.
